channel.title: HELP! object problems !111
channel.description:
me and my m8 r tryin to change a object we r tryin to change a broken door to hey baled and make the hay bales like all the others so u can get xp up i hv try ::setobject and the hay baes appere but i carnt attack
plz can sum one help me i would be verry great full if u could help me
THANX. GAMEGURU XX

item.title: HELP! object problems !111
item.dc:creator: @Terrordog Terrordog
item.description:
@Terrordog wrote:

[quote=“sonjichan, post:3, topic:61284”]eeee… Objects are great. Well you can do one of two things, 1, program an object to autospawn there, or 2 you can make a command that whenever you log on automatically converts objects at certain coordinates to different objects. and I chose the latter of the 2. :D[/quote]yes i tried to do it via the update void but that create duse lag because the objects respawned every 15 seconds

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! object problems !111
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("makemine")) { createNewTileObject(absX, absY-1, 2091, 0, 10); addItem(1265,1); }
For example, that command would make a place where you can mine for right infront of you and it gives you also a pickaxe. To make same type of command just change the Object ID (do not change any of the other numbers, 2091 is the object ID) and to the addItem put the item you want the person to get when they do that command.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! object problems !111
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

eeee… Objects are great. Well you can do one of two things, 1, program an object to autospawn there, or 2 you can make a command that whenever you log on automatically converts objects at certain coordinates to different objects. and I chose the latter of the 2.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! object problems !111
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Eh lmao. ::setobject does not do anything else than spawn a object (which you can’t do anything with) use fedexers global object tut if you want to add objects. Tutorial Section<Tutorial List<-Fedexer-

Read full topic
